questions.question: How do design-build projects work in this programme?
questions.answer: They are 3-week intensive courses held in January or June. You work in teams to solve real-life problems using what you've learned during the semester.

questions.question: When and how do I choose a specialisation?
questions.answer: The specialisation is defined by the courses you take. During your first year, it is mandatory to pick at least 2 of the introductary courses. Afterwards, you can use the specialisations as a recommendation for which courses you can take.

questions.question: Can I study abroad during the bachelorâ€™s degree?
questions.answer: Yes, most students go on exchange in the 5th semester. DTU offers many partner universities, which you can explore here: https://beyondborders.dtu.dk/Pages/searchUni.aspx

questions.question: What support is available for students during their studies?
questions.answer: DTU provides academic guidance, mental health support, and career counselling. You can see all options here: https://student.dtu.dk/en/vejledning
